structure.unit: ARTICLE IB. STANDARDS FOR CREATION AND REVIEW OF BOARDS GENERALLY

law.catch_line: Uniform rule for filling of open vacancies on boards that remain unfilled for thirty days.

text.section:
Sec. 2-11.38.3. Uniform rule for filling of open vacancies on boards that remain unfilled for thirty days.
Notwithstanding any other provision of the Code or of any resolution, if a vacancy on any County board which is subject to individual commissioner appointment remains unfilled for more than thirty (30) days, it may thereafter be filled by action of the County Commission.
